titleStmt.title: TEI Customization for the FreeDict Swahili-English xFried Dictionary, version 0.3
titleStmt.author: Piotr Bański (bansp in the domain of o2.pl)

availability.p: This file is released as part of the FreeDict package (http://freedict.org/). It is licensed under the GNU Public License version 2.0 or later.

sourceDesc.p: Initial version created with Roma, the ODD generator, version 3.6.

body.head: ODD for the swa-eng dictionary for FreeDict
body.p: This is the ODD schema for generating schemas for the Swahili-English FreeDict dictionary by Beata Wójtowicz and Piotr Bański. It is meant as a prototype for the future FreeDict dictionary schemas (see http://freedict.org/).

list.item: Removed dictScrap and entryFree and the mysterious header elements that cause Sanity Checker warnings.
Removed numbered divs (with a view towards tailoring this ODD for all FreeDict dictionaries).
